meanings.definition: The fertilization of two or more ova from the same menstrual cycle by sperm from separate acts of sexual intercourse.
meanings.sent1: Superfecundation can result in twins with different fathers.
meanings.sent2: The concept of superfecundation is fascinating in the world of genetics.
meanings.sent3: At the baby shower, they joked that superfecundation could lead to siblings with very different traits.
meanings.sent4: The idea of superfecundation is like mixing different paint colors to create a unique shade.
meanings.sent5: In nature, superfecundation ensures genetic diversity among offspring.
